work_experiences.role_description: Developed a GenAI-powered search platform using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), document retrieval pipelines, and chatbot interfaces resulting in 45% increase in answer accuracy and 60% reduction in response time. | Fine-tuned Large Language Models (LLMs) using LoRA and prompt tuning achieving 35% improvement in answer relevancy and 25% reduction in hallucinations. | Applied advanced NLP techniques (NER, topic modeling, intent classification) to extract real-time insights from client servicing conversations. | Designed evaluation frameworks and human-in-the-loop pipelines for production-grade LLM responses.

Implemented sentiment analysis using fine-tuned BERT models achieving 92% classification accuracy and 25% boost in customer satisfaction scores. | Built intent detection systems leveraging transformer-based architectures for intelligent routing and faster query resolution. | Designed Market Mix Optimization framework resulting in 12% uplift in ROI on $900M annual marketing spend. | Trained regression models for sales prediction during extreme weather across 3,000 stores and 30,000 assortments using K-Means clustering and advanced feature engineering.

Developed reinforcement learning and ensemble machine learning models to identify malicious network traffic achieving 97% detection accuracy, 42% reduction in false positives, and 35% improvement in response time. | Implemented post-deployment checks including data drift monitoring to ensure ongoing model effectiveness. | Enhanced security measures through advanced threat detection algorithms.

Contributed to sustainability research lab applying ANOVA and ARIMA for trend forecasting to analyze environmental data trends for impact assessments. | Utilized statistical methods to derive insights improving environmental impact assessments and prediction reliability.

Supported undergraduate instruction through grading, tutoring, and leading discussion sessions. | Led Python and SQL lab sessions improving student coding proficiency and understanding for industrial engineering and machine learning assignments.
Reduced procurement lead time by streamlining processes while leveraging strong negotiation, management, and communication skills to enhance supply chain efficiency.

education_details.degree: Master of Science in Operation Research
Master of Science in Industrial & System Engineering
Bachelor of Engineering in Industrial Engineering
education_details.institution: NED University of Eng and Tech

projects.title: Multivariate Time-Series Stock Price Forecasting
projects.description: Developed a multivariate time-series forecasting model for stock prices using LSTM and sentiment signals extracted via NLP from financial news headlines. Implemented using TensorFlow and NLTK.

projects.title: Grocery Item Classification CNN
projects.description: Trained a convolutional neural network (CNN) on custom image datasets to classify grocery items with real-world camera images. Used data augmentation and batch normalization to improve generalization.

projects.title: Transformer-based Chatbot
projects.description: Built a Transformer-based chatbot capable of context retention and semantic understanding using Hugging Face and spaCy; deployed via a lightweight Flask web interface.

projects.title: Conditional GAN for Dataset Augmentation
projects.description: Used a conditional Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) to augment imbalanced datasets for classification tasks, improving model accuracy on minority classes by 15%.

projects.title: Deep Q-Network Trading Agent
projects.description: Implemented a Deep Q-Network (DQN) agent for simulating equity trading strategies using OpenAI Gym and PyTorch, integrating reward shaping and experience replay for improved learning efficiency.

publications.description: Authored 7 peer-reviewed publications in reputable journals, leveraging statistical methods and data science techniques to extract insights and solve real-world problems.

honors_awards.title: NC State PhD Fellowship Award
honors_awards.description: A prestigious award granted to a select few pursuing a PhD, recognizing exceptional academic excellence and research potential.
